AnswerQuestion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AnswerQuestion
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Question": "社会主义"
}
AnswerQuestion.title: AIGC代答示例

ModerateText.document: 用于客户自有标签体系的内容审核，审核结果会以客户定义的标签体系输出结果
ModerateText.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModerateText
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Content": "5Yqg5oiR5aW95Y+LIOe7meS9oOS8mOaDoOWIuA==",
    "BizType": "test"
}
ModerateText.title: 客制标签文本内容审核
